attributes.review: I hope you have a lot of time on your hands because THIS APP TOOK 26 HOURS TO DOWNLOAD. Once it finally downloaded and I opened it, my phone jumped out of my hand and started committing crimes all over my neighborhood! Some of my neighbors recognized my my little pony phone case and called the cops 🥺 now I’m in jail for 8 years but at least daddy Donny is here so I have someone to plot world domination with 🤤
attributes.title: This app got me arrested! 🤢

attributes.review: I would like to state first that I only had said application for a combined total of five minutes, but its viruses and diseases from the source of the man from which it gets its namesake have corrupted my phone. I’ll probably have to throw it away at this point as it has barely worked since the first time I opened the app. If I could give zero stars, I would. 100% do NOT recommend.
attributes.title: WORST. APP. EVER.

attributes.review: My dog opened my phone and started to dies😭 We took him to the vet and they said they couldn’t do anything anymore. I show the vet this app and she started to cry to because she said that this app killed her bunny. I went home gave this app a 2rd try, I was right beside my fish tank and my goldfish jump to. The other 2 goldfish’s jump out to. May they Rest In Peace. They life’s need to be known to the whole world.
attributes.title: Bad for dogs

attributes.review: All these bad reviews are not real there dumb kids from tiktok the only reason they even wrote a review is because there was a tiktok that told them to

attributes.review: so i heard rumors that if you downloaded the app, Ian Somerhalder would show up by your poolside. unfortunately that never happened😾 i was extremely angry and this app is a ✨l i e✨ i’m also very unpleased with the fact that our horrible president’s nudes showed up on my screen while i was using the app. if needs taken down asap. because others have had the same problem.
attributes.title: ✨t h i s   a p p   i s   t r a s h✨

attributes.review: I got the app as a joke around 1 as then I proceeded to go to bed when I woke up I got three hundred new notifications from this app and I headed out to my living room and someone was at the door. I opened the door not knowing who it’s was he then saw my little brother punched him 2 times and left as he was leaving he placed a flag saying “trump 2020” in our yard!!  Please don’t get this app it will curse you
attributes.title: What is this

attributes.review: This has to genuinely be the worst app i’ve ever had. I originally downloaded this app hoping to save my bb barron trump 2020 from his horrible orange of a father. i was very disappointed to see an orange in front of the american flag when i opened it. i personally think this is false advertising. this app needs to be taken down, now. it’s a threat to my 12 children and it very much goes against my religion.
attributes.title: worst app

attributes.review: I was trying to download a pizza app and ended up downloading this stupid app and they had the AUDACITY to not serve pizza. The only food they have is ORANGES and I just wanted a slice of pepperoni pizza but they refused me. Horrible service, horrible idea and just a horrible pizza app. What kind of pizza app only sells oranges!?😡 I think I went blind after looking at this app becuase it just hurt my eyes to see it and it deserves nothing and no support
attributes.title: the WORST app to ever exist ✨

attributes.review: HE TRYNA GET RID OF TIKTOK MY GUY! He has close to no reason to get rid of this app. TikTok is an app where people are now speaking their mind and stating their own opinions. Now, Trump is trying to take that away from us. We cannot let someone as corrupt as him take precious things away from us. TIKTOK allowed everyone to connect during the pandemic and now he is trying to separate us?? Take down this app y’all!!!🥴🥴🥴🤡🤡🤡
attributes.title: It rlly do be like dat doe✊😔

attributes.review:
It saddens me to see and write this review but it must be said .at first I downloaded this app with such joy and glee .i expected to see our corrupted 🤡🤡🤡cheese puff🤡🤡 .but at my dismay this horrible app was in its place. I proceeded to laugh for a quick 24 hrs to our 🐷president🐷 idiotic app .at the speed of⚡️I deleted this app . All I will say is this app shows the ugly big scary fat life of our one ad only🐷
